generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and arrows, indicating it is a road for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: There is a sidewalk on the right side of the road, bordered by a curb and vegetation.
- building: Multi-story brick buildings are visible on the left side of the road.
- fence: A black metal fence runs along the right side of the road, next to the sidewalk.
- pole: Traffic light poles are visible on both sides of the road.
- traffic light: Red traffic lights are visible at the intersection, controlling the flow of traffic.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are present along the right side of the road and in the background.
- terrain: Grass and some weeds are visible along the edges of the road and sidewalk.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings and trees.
- person: Several pedestrians are crossing the road in the middle of the image.
- car: Several cars are parked along the left side of the road, and one car is visible in the foreground.
- motorcycle: No motorcycle is visible in the image.
